allow: Bash(powershell -Command "[Console]::OutputEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8; cd scripts; python administration.py verify-install")
Bash(powershell -Command "$env:PYTHONIOENCODING=''utf-8''; cd scripts; python administration.py verify-install")
Bash(cmd /c "chcp 65001 > nul && cd scripts && python administration.py verify-install")
